verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm נְאֻ֤ם <S%H5002><s%> said יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לַֽאדֹנִ֗י <S%H113><s%> unto my Lord שֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> Sit לִֽימִינִ֑י <S%H3225><s%> thou at my right hand עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until אָשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> until I make אֹ֝יְבֶ֗יךָ <S%H341><s%> thine enemies הֲדֹ֣ם <S%H1916><s%> stool לְרַגְלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H7272><s%> your feet

מַטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> the rod עֻזְּךָ֗ <S%H5797><s%> of thy strength יִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> shall send יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִצִּיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> out of Zion רְ֝דֵ֗ה <S%H7287><s%> rule בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> thou in the midst אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H341><s%> of thine enemies

עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> Thy people נְדָבֹת֮ <S%H5071><s%> [shall be] willing בְּי֪וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day חֵ֫ילֶ֥ךָ <S%H2428><s%> of thy power בְּֽהַדְרֵי־ <S%H1926><s%> in the beauties קֹ֭דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of holiness מֵרֶ֣חֶם <S%H7358><s%> from the womb מִשְׁחָ֑ר <S%H4891><s%> of the morning לְ֝ךָ֗ טַ֣ל <S%H2919><s%> thou hast the dew יַלְדֻתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3208><s%> of thy youth

נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> hath sworn יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and will not יִנָּחֵ֗ם <S%H5162><s%> and will not repent אַתָּֽה־ <S%H859><s%> you כֹהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> Thou [art] a priest לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> According דִּ֝בְרָתִ֗י <S%H1700><s%> after the order מַלְכִּי־ צֶֽדֶק׃ <S%H4442><s%> of Melchizedek

אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> The Lord עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is at יְמִֽינְךָ֑ <S%H3225><s%> at thy right hand מָחַ֖ץ <S%H4272><s%> shall strike בְּיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> in the day אַפּ֣וֹ <S%H639><s%> of his wrath מְלָכִֽים׃ <S%H4428><s%> through kings

יָדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> He shall judge בַּ֭גּוֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen מָלֵ֣א <S%H4390><s%> he shall fill גְוִיּ֑וֹת <S%H1472><s%> [the places] with the dead bodies מָ֥חַץ <S%H4272><s%> he shall wound רֹ֝֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the heads עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> countries רַבָּֽה׃ <S%H7227><s%> over many

מִ֭נַּחַל <S%H5158><s%> of the brook בַּדֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way יִשְׁתֶּ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> He shall drink עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֝֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יָרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> therefore shall he lift up רֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> the head
